knimeNode.name: UnifiedConformanceChecker
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is set for the unified conformance cheking without configuration from event log and Petri net. It's proper to use in a loop. It includes the unified options: the unified cost for moves, the replayer, the classifier.

fullDescription.option: Unified move cost for three types of moves. First is the model move cost, then the log move cost, at end, it is the syn move cost.
Different replayer to align the model and event log
The classifier chosen to create map with event log and Petri net
